definition: A term used to describe a range of potential or feasible options, actions, or outcomes that are within the realm of possibility. It is commonly employed when discussing various alternatives or choices that can be considered or explored in a given situation.

examples.german: Das ist die beste Lösung, die wir im Moment haben.
examples.english: This is the best solution we have at the moment.

examples.german: Wir müssen alle möglichen Optionen in Betracht ziehen.
examples.english: We need to consider all possible options.

examples.german: Es gibt viele mögliche Ursachen für das Problem.
examples.english: There are many possible causes for the problem.

examples.german: Bitte geben Sie uns so viele mögliche Termine wie möglich.
examples.english: Please provide us with as many possible dates as possible.

examples.german: Wir werden unser Bestes tun, um alle möglichen Probleme zu lösen.
examples.english: We will do our best to solve all possible problems.
